ModMetaData.name: No more sleeping Z's
ModMetaData.author: zymex
ModMetaData.description:
[1.1] Just upadated Mins / 7H28J, No more sleeping Z's to 1.1 since i missed it in my play, i'll delete on request
[1.0] No more sleeping Z's above Colonist and Animal heads! This mod should help FPS for those who have a lot of Animals in their Colony.
